a: Of course! The Figicons icon set & converter script is free and open source.

q: Can I import my own icons?
a: Yep! Apart from the default icons, you can add your own ones. Check the 'Building custom icons' section to learn more.

For now at least. Currently Figicons only support a direct integration with Figma due to the ease of their API platform. However, you can still manually add your SVG icon exports in and convert them using Figicons.
Yes. Figicons cleans all stroke properties from imported icons and adds a unified style over them, which you can later override.
